page.title: 20Credits.
page.content: The compiling of data for this block was undertaken by the pupils and staff of Belford County First School,aided by first form pupils and children of the Hearing Impaired unit of Belford County Middle School,together with their teachers. Acknowledgement of the valuable help and advice provided by the following individuals is gratefully recorded. J.M.McDonald:Planning Officer, Berwick_upon_Tweed Borough Council R.Connell Esq.:Architect G.Thomson Esq.:Greenwich Estates Mrs Betty Brown:Tennis Mr J.Duncan:Cricket and Football Mr R.Martin:Badminton Mrs W.Martin:Education 1952 Mr J.Sprot:Education 1920's Dr.R.Pawson Mrs Lillico:Health Visitor Mrs L.Smith:Community Visitor
